A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When did the Star Wars franchise incorporate the talents of Mary Poppins?  Do the creators of \"The Last Jedi\" understand basic physics (e.g. if I drop a bomb in a ZERO gravity environment\, the chances are great that it will not hit a target located directly below me)? What is Fin's character arc? (answer\, he doesn't have one). How did Rey become a full-fledged\, battle-hardened Jedi Knight in less than one movie\, when it took Luke Skywalker a full three movies to achieve supreme potency?....These are just a few (out of many) valid critiques I have regarding this abysmal film.  And one last item...the 91% that rated this film \"FRESH\".....what film were they watching???
